eye-opener do you know what it means
come let's find out what this idiom
means and how you can use it in your
daily conversation an eye-opener it was
an eye-opener well we all see with open
eyes and learn from things around us by
observing but in life we face certain
incidents suddenly or by surprise these
incidents make us learn new things we
learn these things suddenly or by
surprise you can say something is an
eye-opener if it made you realize
something you haven't been aware of
before
if you describe something as an
eye-opener you mean that it surprises
you and that you learn something new
from it or you can say a situation that
shows you or teaches you something
surprising that you did not know before
in short and I open a means something
that surprises you and teaches you new
facts about life or people in other
context and eye-opener also means a
drink of liquor taken to stimulate
especially upon the wakening all right
now let's look at some example sentences
on how to use iOpener in your daily
conversation
example one Al Gore's film An
Inconvenient Truth was a real eye-opener
for me I haven't really understood how
serious global warming was until I saw
it example to Mary said her trip to
Thailand was quite an eye-opener for her
she'd never realized before how
beautiful thialand was or how friendly
the people were example three the
managers presentation on cloud computing
was an eye-opener
one can carry his computer on-the-go
example for the nuclear crisis in Japan
was an eye-opener to the nuclear safety
and emergency response systems in many
countries example five writing these
scripts has been quite an eye-opener to
me it proves that one can do anything if
the need is urgent example six Jenny and
the other kids went on their first visit
to the zoo today and it was a real
eye-opener for them they had never seen
animals like that before
I hope this episode is an eye-opener to
you
